Class View

org.eclipse.core.runtime.IAdaptable, org.eclipse.core.runtime.IExecutableExtension, org.eclipse.ui.IPersistable, org.eclipse.ui.IViewPart, org.eclipse.ui.IWorkbenchPart, org.eclipse.ui.IWorkbenchPart2, org.eclipse.ui.part.IWorkbenchPartOrientation
public class View
extends org.eclipse.ui.part.ViewPart

The only GUI element: a View containing a browser widget for results, input fields for texts and some buttons.

Author:
Fabian Steeg (fsteeg)

constructTree

public static void constructTree(java.lang.String text,
                                 boolean forWords,
                                 boolean reverse)
                          throws java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException,
                                 java.lang.InterruptedException
Construct a tree for an input, exports it as dot

Parameters:
text - The text to be represented by the tree
forWords - flag to indicate is this tree is for words (or chars)
reverse - flag to indicate if this tree should be build for a reverse version of the text
Throws:
java.lang.InterruptedException
java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException
